name: Onfleet Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Onfleet Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Onfleet API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Onfleet API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.description: The resource to perform operations on
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 作用: The resource to perform operations on | 默认值: task

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new Onfleet worker
Delete (值: delete) - Delete an Onfleet worker
Get (值: get) - Get a specific Onfleet worker
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many Onfleet workers
Get Schedule (值: getSchedule) - Get a specific Onfleet worker schedule
Update (值: update) - Update an Onfleet worker

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the worker object for lookup
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Worker ID | 作用: The ID of the worker object for lookup | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 64

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The worker's name | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The administrator's email address | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: capacity (值: None) - The maximum number of units this worker can carry, for route optimization purposes
displayName (值: None) - This value is used in place of the worker's actual name within sms notifications, delivery tracking pages, and across organization boundaries

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: capacity (值: None) - The maximum number of units this worker can carry, for route optimization purposes
displayName (值: None) - This value is used in place of the worker's actual name within sms notifications, delivery tracking pages, and across organization boundaries
teams (值: None) - One or more teams of which the worker is a member. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

containerType.name: containerType
containerType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Container Type | (必填项)

containerId.name: containerId
containerId.description: The object ID according to the container chosen
containerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Container ID | 作用: The object ID according to the container chosen | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Insert Type | (必填项)

index.name: index
index.description: The index given indicates the position where the tasks are going to be inserted
index.natural_language_description: 参数名: Index | 作用: The index given indicates the position where the tasks are going to be inserted | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

tasks.name: tasks
tasks.description: Task's ID that are going to be used
tasks.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task IDs | 作用: Task's ID that are going to be used | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: analytics (值: None) - Whether a more detailed response is needed, includes basic worker duty event, traveled distance (meters) and time analytics
filter (值: None) - A list of fields to show in the response, if all are not desired

unparsed.name: unparsed
unparsed.description: Whether or not the address is specified in a single unparsed string
unparsed.natural_language_description: 参数名: Unparsed Address | 作用: Whether or not the address is specified in a single unparsed string | 默认值: False | (必填项)

address.name: address
address.natural_language_description: 参数名: Destination Address | 作用: The destination's street address details | (必填项)

addressNumber.name: addressNumber
addressNumber.description: The number component of this address, it may also contain letters
addressNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: Number | 作用: The number component of this address, it may also contain letters | (必填项)

addressStreet.name: addressStreet
addressStreet.natural_language_description: 参数名: Street | 作用: The name of the street | (必填项)

addressCity.name: addressCity
addressCity.natural_language_description: 参数名: City | 作用: The name of the municipality | (必填项)

addressCountry.name: addressCountry
addressCountry.natural_language_description: 参数名: Country | 作用: The name of the country | (必填项)

destination.name: destination
destination.natural_language_description: 参数名: Destination | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

getBy.name: getBy
getBy.description: The variable that is used for looking up a recipient
getBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Get By | 作用: The variable that is used for looking up a recipient | 默认值: id | (必填项)

phone.name: phone
phone.description: A list of worker’s phone numbers
phone.natural_language_description: 参数名: Phone | 作用: A list of worker’s phone numbers | (必填项)

recipientName.name: recipientName
recipientName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Recipient Name | 作用: The recipient's complete name | (必填项)

recipientPhone.name: recipientPhone
recipientPhone.description: A unique, valid phone number as per the organization's country if there's no leading + sign. If a phone number has a leading + sign, it will disregard the organization's country setting.
recipientPhone.natural_language_description: 参数名: Recipient Phone | 作用: A unique, valid phone number as per the organization's country if there's no leading + sign. If a phone number has a leading + sign, it will disregard the organization's country setting. | (必填项)

success.name: success
success.description: Whether the task's completion was successful
success.natural_language_description: 参数名: Complete as a Success | 作用: Whether the task's completion was successful | 默认值: True | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: states (值: None) - List of worker states
teams (值: None) - A list of the teams that workers must be part of. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
phones (值: None) - A list of workers' phone numbers

overrideFields.name: overrideFields
overrideFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Override Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: completeAfter (值: None) - The earliest time the task should be completed
completeBefore (值: None) - The latest time the task should be completed
notes (值: None) - Notes for the task
pickupTask (值: None) - Whether the task is a pickup task
serviceTime (值: None) - The number of minutes to be spent by the worker on arrival at this task's destination, for route optimization purposes

workers.name: workers
workers.description: A list of workers. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
workers.natural_language_description: 参数名: Worker Names or IDs | 作用: A list of workers. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

managers.name: managers
managers.description: A list of managing administrators. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
managers.natural_language_description: 参数名: Administrator Names or IDs | 作用: A list of managing administrators. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

byLocation.name: byLocation
byLocation.description: Whether to search for only those workers who are currently within a certain target area
byLocation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search by Location | 作用: Whether to search for only those workers who are currently within a certain target area | 默认值: False | (必填项)

teams.name: teams
teams.description: One or more teams of which the worker is a member. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
teams.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team Names or IDs | 作用: One or more teams of which the worker is a member. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

longitude.name: longitude
longitude.description: The longitude component of the coordinate pair
longitude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Longitude | 作用: The longitude component of the coordinate pair | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

latitude.name: latitude
latitude.description: The latitude component of the coordinate pair
latitude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Latitude | 作用: The latitude component of the coordinate pair | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

schedule.name: schedule
schedule.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schedule | 默认值: {}
